steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6r2sr","text":"Plate preparation:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ef9g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ds6qd","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3hq6b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6s4dc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dg3d4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9g44b","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3o5iv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":63,"offset":166},{"key":1,"length":65,"offset":234}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"883en","text":"This protocol has been used to differentiate dopaminergic neurons from hPSC adapted to feeder free culture systems. Our version of the protocol has been adapted from Kim et al 2021; Cell Stem Cell 28, 343–355 e5, February 4, 2021 and Piao et al. 2021; Cell Stem Cell 28, 217-229 e7, February 4, 2021.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"31BEDA2B985D4E5CAABFADC8E48DBA58","url":"http://10.1016/j.stem.2021.01.005"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"link"},"1":{"data":{"guid":"00F914403C0946109E5F60A54B8BF9AE","url":"https://doi.org/10.1016/j.stem.2021.01.004"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"link"}}}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":2,"offset":122,"style":"bold"},{"length":2,"offset":148,"style":"bold"}],"key":"2mncp","text":"We have used two alternative protocol variants with minor modifications which will be outlined at the respective steps as SP (Soldner Protocol) and HP (Hockemeyer Protocol).","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":46,"offset":125}],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":46,"offset":125,"style":"UNDERLINE"}],"key":"cslb8","text":"It is important to start the differentiation from pristine, undifferentiated feeder free cultures. For more details consult: https://doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.b4mcqu2w","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"4E711016AFEC11EEA1840A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.b4mcqu2w"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"link"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6lit3","text":"Matrigel/Geltrex coating: Prepare matrigel/geltrex (1:30) in cold DMEM/F12 or DPBS in a 15 ml tube as described by the manufacturer. Coat each well with 1-1.5 ml (6 well plate size) or 0.5 ml (12w plate size)  of solution and incubate at   incubator for at least   to 1 hour.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":238,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":263,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fte1b","text":"Laminin coating: Prepare laminin (2 µg/ml) in cold DPBS and coat each well of a 6-well plate with 1.5ml laminin solution (2 µg/ml) and incubate  at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":144,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":148,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6uo1l","text":"Poly-L-Ornithine (PLO) + Fibronectin (F) + Laminin (L) coating: Prepare PLO (15 µg/ml) in sterile water and coat each well with 0.5-1 ml making sure it covers the entire surface. Incubate at   for   to overnight. The day after, wash each well with sterile water 4 times and add a new solution with fibronectin (1 µg/ml) and laminin (2 µg/ml) (in water) and incubate  at  . Do not let the wells dry.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":62}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":191,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":197,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":366,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":370,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":21600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":21600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bf1p3","text":"Poly-L-Ornithine (PLO) + Laminin (L) coating: Prepare PLO (15 µg/ml) in sterile water and coat each well of a 12-well plate with 0.5-1 ml making sure it covers the entire surface. Incubate at   for   to overnight. The day after, wash each well with sterile water 2 times and add a new solution with laminin (2 µg/ml) (in cold DPBS) and incubate   at  . Do not let the wells dry.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":44}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":192,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":198,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":345,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":350,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":21600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":21600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2j908","text":"Media recipes:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8v3e9","text":"Media A: Neurobasal media + N2 supplement (1% vol/vol) + B27 supplement without vitamin A (2% vol/vol) + L-Glutamine (2 mM) + Penicillin-Streptomycin (100U/ml) + SHH (200 ng/ml) + CHIR99021 (0.7 µM) + LDN (250 nM) + SB431542 (10 µM).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ai78p","text":"Media B: Neurobasal media + N2 supplement (1% vol/vol) + B27 supplement without vitamin A (2% vol/vol) + L-Glutamine (2 mM) + Penicillin-Streptomycin (100U/ml) + SHH (200 ng/ml) + CHIR99021 (7.5 µM) + LDN (250 nM) + SB431542 (10 µM).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e2tv7","text":"Media C: Neurobasal media + N2 supplement (1% vol/vol) + B27 supplement without vitamin A (2% vol/vol) + L-Glutamine (2 mM) + Penicillin-Streptomycin (100U/ml) + CHIR99021 (7.5 µM).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f5skl","text":"Media D: Neurobasal media + B27 supplement without vitamin A (2% vol/vol) + L-Glutamine (2 mM) + Penicillin-Streptomycin (100U/ml) + BDNF (20 ng/ml) + GDNF (20 ng/ml) + Ascorbic acid (200 µM) + Dibutyryl-cAMP (0.5 mM) + TGFꞵ3 (1ng/ml) + CHIR99021 (3 µM).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c26k0","text":"Precursor splitting media: Neurobasal media + B27 supplement without vitamin A (2% vol/vol) + L-Glutamine (2 mM) + Penicillin-Streptomycin (100U/ml) + BDNF (20 ng/ml) + GDNF (20 ng/ml) + Ascorbic acid (200 µM) + Dibutyryl-cAMP (0.5 mM) + TGFꞵ3 (1ng/ml).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dfehe","text":"Maturation media: Neurobasal media + B27 supplement without vitamin A (2% vol/vol) + L-Glutamine (2 mM) + Penicillin-Streptomycin (100U/ml) + BDNF (20 ng/ml) + GDNF (20 ng/ml) + Ascorbic acid (200 µM) + Dibutyryl-cAMP (0.5 mM) + TGFꞵ3 (1ng/ml) + DAPT (10 µM).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"esh7j","text":"Day 0: Dissociate hPSCs using accutase (  -  ). Quench dissociation by diluting the accutase solution with mTeSR-plus media + 10 µM Y-27632 and collect the cells into a 15ml conical tube. Spin the cells down at   for  . Remove the supernatant, resuspend the cells in mTeSR-plus media + 10 µM Y-27632 and count them. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":211,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":217,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"105","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":1324}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"13nce","text":"SP: Plate the cells at 400-600k/cm2 in media A + 10 µM Y-27632 onto geltrex coated plates (adjust cell number to the plate size being used).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2l26g","text":"HP: Plate the cells at 400-600k/well in a 6-well plate in mTeSR-plus + 10 µM Y-27632 onto matrigel coated plates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"53rqe","text":"Day 1-3: Change the media - media A (change daily or every other day as necessary).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"femft","text":"Day 4 and day 6: Change the media- media B (change daily or every other day as necessary).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"765tf","text":"Day 7 and Day 9: Change the media - media C (change daily or every other day as necessary).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cqt4u","text":"Day 10: Change the media -  media D.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ean59","text":"Day 11: Passage #1. Dissociate cells using accutase (approximately   -    but longer incubations may be necessary to properly detach the cells). Quench dissociation by diluting the accutase solution with 1 ml/well media D + 10 µM Y-27632. Collect cells in 15ml conical tubes and spin them down at   -  . Remove the supernatant, resuspend the cell in media D + 10 µM Y-27632.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":67,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":71,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":297,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":301,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2o2v4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"300","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":1324}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4npuo","text":"SP: Count the cells and plate them at 800k/cm2 in media D + 10 µM Y-27632 onto PLO+F+L coated plates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3euqj","text":"HP: Split 1:2 in precursor splitting media + 10 µM Y-27632 onto laminin-coated plates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"44sps","text":"Day 12-15: Change the media - maturation media (change daily or every other day as necessary).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"euqg4","text":"Day 16: Passage #2. Dissociate cells using accutase (approximately   -   but longer incubations may be necessary to properly dissociate collect the cells). Quench dissociation by diluting accutase with 1 ml/well precursor splitting media + 10 µM Y-27632. Collect the cells in 15 ml conical tubes and spin them down at   -  . Remove the supernatant, resuspend the cell in precursor splitting media + 10 µM Y-27632 and count them. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":67,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":71,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":318,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":322,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"27ijp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"300","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":1324}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"pgr8","text":"SP: Plate the cells at 800k/cm2 in precursor splitting media + 10 µM Y-27632 onto PLO+F+L coated plates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ss0k","text":"HP: Plate the cells at \u003e1 million cells per well of 12-well plate in maturation media + 10 µM Y-27632 onto PLO+L coated plates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ama4b","text":"Day 17-24: Change the media - maturation media (change daily or every other day as necessary).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"17ud7","text":"Day 25: Passage #3.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2abbg","text":"SP: Dissociate cells using papain solution (  -  ). Inactivate papain solution using ovomucoid trypsin inhibitor (10mg/ml). Collect your cells in 15 ml conical tubes and spin them down at   -  . Remove the supernatant, resuspend the cells in maturation media + 10 µM Y-27632 and count them. Plate the cells at 200-300k/cm2 in maturation media + 10 µM Y-27632 onto PLO+L+F coated plates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":48,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":188,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":192,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3d3uv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"300","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":1324}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fuano","text":"HP: Dissociate cells using accutase (approximately   -   is the usual standard but longer incubations may be necessary to properly detach the cells). Quench accutase by adding maturation media + 10 µM Y-27632. Collect your cells in 15 ml conical tubes and spin them down at   -  . Remove the supernatant, resuspend the cells in maturation media + 10 µM Y-27632 and count them.
